item.title: Host a Website on GitHub Pages
item.description: This post expects you to already be able to create a GitHub repository and push changes onto it. Any GitHub repository can be hosted with GitHub Pages. Each GitHub account is allowed 1 user site and unlimited project sites. Both kinds will have a limit of 1GB of storage and of 100GB of monthly bandwidth. For a repository to be hosted on GitHub Pages it must be public (unless you have GitHub Pro).
